Super Pakpak

by AOH Games

Released Jul 23, 2010
Players 2-4
License Unknown

Download ROM

Play now

Description

Super Pakpak is a 2-4 player Spacewar! Thrust Gravity force style game. At least two players are needed to start the game. HOLD button A at the start menu to begin a game. The game will begin after the counter counts to zero. In two player games, you need to get two kills in a round before the level ends. In three or four player games, the level ends when there is only one ship remaining. There are 12 scenes in the game, after the 12th scene the game is reverted back to the first scene. After any player gets 50 points, the game ends and the end screen will appear.
